full_summary:
```markdown
# 2023 Global Environment Facility (GEF) Event Venue Rental

## Advanced Contract Award Notice (ACAN) Overview

**Contract Title:** Rental of Venue for 2023 Global Environment Facility (GEF) Seventh Assembly
**Solicitation Number:** PW-23-01021147
**Issuing Department:** Foreign Affairs, Trade and Development (Department of)
**Issued Date:** 2023-01-13
**Closing Time and Date:** 2023-01-27T13:00:00

### Description

The Department of Foreign Affairs, Trade and Development (DFATD) intends to rent a venue for the 2023 Global Environment Facility (GEF) Seventh Assembly, scheduled to take place from August 21-27, 2023, in Vancouver, British Columbia.

### Requirements

The selected supplier must provide the following services:

* Conference space with a minimum capacity of 51 conference rooms
* Food and beverage options that meet the Treasury Board's Directive on Travel, Hospitality, Conference, and Event Expenditures
* Services for the entire duration of the event, including setup, breaks, and tear-down

### Evaluation Criteria

Bidders will be evaluated based on their ability to meet the above-mentioned requirements and provide the best value for the services.

### Statement of Capabilities

The Department invites interested suppliers to submit a Statement of Capabilities in writing via email to the Contracting Officer, Micheline Lafontaine, at micheline.lafontaine@international.gc.ca. The Statement of Capabilities should include:

* A description of the services offered
* Proof of experience in providing similar services
* Proof of financial stability and ability to meet the requirements of the contract

## Trade Agreements

This tender is subject to the World Trade Organization Agreement on Government Procurement (WTO GPA).

### Contact Information

For any questions or clarification, please contact:

Micheline Lafontaine
Contracting Officer
Department of Foreign Affairs, Trade and Development (DFATD)
Contracting Unit
Summits Management Office
Phone: 819-921-0778
Email: micheline.lafontaine@international.gc.ca
```
